welcome.title: Summary of records
welcome.content:
On this page, you can view a list of all the records under the record type you selected, and their status.

You can filter existing records and create new ones, as well as duplicate, edit or delete a record.

filters.title: Filters
filters.content: Use these filters to see a list of all records, published, draft or records pending approval.

Keyword.title: Keyword
Keyword.content: Search the list by typing a word of your choice.

adding.title: Adding a new record
adding.content: Click on the “Add New” button to start creating a new record.

duplicate.title: Duplicating a record
duplicate.content: Click here to create a duplicate of the existing record.

edit.title: Editing a record
edit.content: Click here to edit an existing record.

needHelp.title: Need help?
needHelp.content: Click here to access contextual help where you can find more information related to this page.

needMoreHelp.title: Need more help?
needMoreHelp.content: Us the Chat feature to message us for additional support.
